name: Great White Shark
description: Premium microbial inoculant for enhanced root growth
instructions: Apply 1 teaspoon per gallon of water every week.

name: Base A
description: Essential nutrient mix for the vegetative stage of growth
instructions: Use 5 ml per gallon of water during the vegetative stage.

name: Base B
description: Complementary nutrient mix for the flowering stage
instructions: Use 5 ml per gallon of water during the flowering stage.

name: Vege
description: Complete nutrient formula for vigorous vegetative growth
instructions: Apply 10 ml per gallon of water every week.

name: Silica
instructions: Use 2 ml per gallon of water every 2 weeks.

name: Mycorrhizae x Trichoderma
description: Beneficial fungi to improve root health and nutrient uptake
instructions: Apply 1 tablespoon per plant when planting.

name: PhitoNat Plus
description: Advanced plant health supplement for overall vitality
instructions: Use 5 ml per gallon of water every 2 weeks.

name: Big Bud
description: Stimulates flower development for larger buds
instructions: Use 10 ml per gallon of water during flowering.

name: Bloom
description: Specialized nutrient formula to enhance flowering
instructions: Apply 15 ml per gallon of water during the flowering stage.

name: Bud Candy
description: Enhances flavor and aroma of flowers
instructions: Use 5 ml per gallon of water during the last 4 weeks of flowering.

name: Flawless Finish
description: Clears out residues and improves the final quality of harvest
instructions: Apply 10 ml per gallon of water during the last week before harvest.
